title: Chungnam Asan FC
text:
Chungnam Asan Football Club is a South Korean <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Asan">Asan</a>.
History.
In November 2019, it was announced that <a href="Asan%20Mugunghwa%20FC">Asan Mugunghwa</a>, the police football club in which the South Korean footballers served their two-year military duty, would be transformed into a civil football club, where non-South Korean foreign footballers will also be able to play. The club's new name, Chungnam Asan FC, along with a new crest, was officially revealed on 27 December 2019.
Squad.
